name: The Lone Knight: Prototype
description:
Become A Knight in a action/adventure with beautiful low poly environments. At this time there are now 3 playable scenes/levels; a forest, harsh desert, and snowy mountain valley. In these scenes you will meet a variety of NPCs as well as many dangerous enemies ranging from foot soldiers to enemy knights to viking raiders.

  • A third scene/level is a snowy winter setting. (DONE)
  • New Animations Round One. (DONE)
  • The Lone Knight is no longer being developed, but you can checkout a more recent adaptation of it below!
